processingLink: ⏳ Processing the link, it will take no more than a minute
pleaseWait:
⚡️ Your request is being processed
⌛️ Please be patient
beforeUpload: 📥 While we're uploading the video to Telegram, you can use the following links for a quick download 👇
tooLargeSize:
⚠️ The file size is too large for uploading to Telegram
Please use the links above 👆
just click on the button with the desired resolution)
incorrectLink:
❌ Failed to parse the link(
Something might be wrong with the file...
TweetUnavailable: 🔒 Unfortunately, this tweet is protected and unavailable for viewing
Unavailable: ⚠️ Due to the [updated Twitter API](https://twitter.com/TwitterDev/status/1641222786894135296), links are temporarily not processed
feedbackExample:
Here you can send a message to the developer! 👤
Think carefully, express your thought fully, and fit it into one message ✍️

Below are examples of different types of feedback you can send:
- Hi! I would like to suggest adding feature X, which would allow us to do Y 📈
- Hi! I noticed a bug in function X when I do Y 🛠
feedbackReceived:
✉️ Feedback received!
You can continue using the bot 🚀
smthWentWrong: ❌ Oops, something went wrong. Please try again.
botUpTechIssues:
Hey! 👋
Technical issues have been resolved 🛠✅
You can use the bot again 🚀
techIssues: 🛠 Currently, technical work is being carried out on the bot, so some links may not be processed. This will take no more than a couple of hours!
botUpText:
***Hey there! 🎉***
Guess who's back? ***Our Telegram bot***! It's here again to assist you just like before. Feel free to use our services 🤖
